short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AnnyAI is an AI assistant for your research and writing needs, and ANNYthing else you can think of.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ù§Ô∏è We all love AI and use it all the time! ‚ù§Ô∏è

‚ùì How do we use AI?
‚ùó Typically, we have DATA + PROMPTS and send it to the AI. With AnnyAI, you simplify this: You select text (data) from any website or paste in your own data and click a button (prompt)... AI will do the rest! No writing, just click a button.

Three examples (but of course you can create your own buttons (prompts) and use them with any data):

üì¨ "Reply to this email":
While the email you need to reply to will be different each time, the prompt will always be the same. With AnnyAI you select your email and click the "Reply email" button.

üìù "Summarize this text":
The text you want to summarize will be a different one each time. But you have guessed it: You select your text you want to summarize and click the "Summarize" button.

ü§Ø "Explain like I am 12 years old":
We all have moments of confusion. With AnnyAI, you can select any text and click your "Explain" button. AI will explain it to you like you are 12 years old.


Go to https://annyai.com to see more examples.

üîë PLEASE NOTE: You will need an OpenAI API key to use AnnyAI.

üéâ AnnyAI Premium:
There will be a premium version of AnnyAI but at the moment the free and premium version are the same. Premium will include:
- Saving all messages and search, browse them
- Chat option like ChatGPT
